channel.title: Galleries on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site
channel.description: Recent content in Galleries on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site

item.title: Visiting Chalmers
item.description: As a visiting PhD student, I have been at Chalmers tekniska högskola (Chalmers University of Technology) in Göteborg, Sweden since Jan. I will work with professor Sheng Guo and Dr. Zhenyuan Xia for about 3 months here.

item.title: Seminar held
item.description: I attented “初めてのCAD、初めての3Dプリンター講習会” (Lecture for using CAD and 3D-printer for the first time) as an instructor.
